short_summary: Upgrade road and underground infrastructure at the Keltic Lodge Area of Cape Breton Highland National Park
full_summary:
**Title**
Stage 2 - Cape Breton Highlands National Park Infrastructure Upgrades

**Reference**
cb-7751-20889052 - 5P468-23-0046/A-001

**Publish Date**
July 31, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
August 10, 2023, 1:00 PM (AST)

**Overview**
Parks Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a financial bid for the Keltic Road Infrastructure Upgrades (East) project, Phase 1, at Cape Breton Highlands National Park. The project involves infrastructure upgrades, including road renewal, water distribution system replacement, sanitary sewer collection system upgrade, and other components.

**Project Requirements**

The work includes supply and installation of environmental protection measures, traffic control, signage, and rehabilitation of roadways within the eastern portion of Keltic Lodge area. The project also comprises the replacement of the watermain, sanitary pipe network, and storm sewer network. In addition, mechanical and electrical upgrades to the Keltic Lodge lift station will be performed. All work will be carried out in accordance with applicable federal and provincial regulations.

**Key Components**

* Road renewal, including full-depth reconstruction with gravel and asphalt paving
* Replacement of watermain and sanitary pipe network
* Construction of new storm sewer network
* Mechanical and electrical upgrades to the Keltic Lodge lift station
* Restoration of affected off-road areas
* Maintenance of roadways and dust control throughout the project duration

**Procurement Method**
This tender is being issued under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers are required to submit a sealed financial bid.
